Defense Minister of UK, Grant Chapsa cited statistics, comparing NATO's military potential with Russia's military potential.

Video with a passage of his speech at a meeting of the Special Defense Committee Grant ShappsPublishedIn the social network H.

According to him, if in Britain suddenly a direct military conflict with Russia, it will be a war of NATO against Russia.

And in NATO, according to Grant Shapps, more than in Russia, three times more submarines, more than more helicopters, more than armored vehicles, 4,5 times more warships, 8 times more transport aircraft, more than artillery, more than artillery, more 16 times more aircraft carriers and three times more soldiers.

Yesterday I responded to the Defence Select Committee when they asked about how we would fair in a direct conflict with Russia. I pointed out we would have NATO on our side. And here is the maths…pic.twitter.com/uONOgdtnoP

— Rt Hon Grant Shapps MP (@grantshapps)March 27, 2024

"In other words, we would be in a very strong position," the Britain's Defense Minister emphasized.
